column5: My Bait of choose Bass Magnet Swim Bait 5.5" & 7"  27" & 29" Pike on a Husky Jerk he was pretty happy
Very nice. Those swim baits can really catch fish! Nothing like father and son spending quality time together. Good for you.

next to kids fishing pics I love to see father and son days as many know here time is short great to see you let him kick you butt for the day LOL.  I have not used the bass magnets but do really like there water wolf musky sized lures not to mention that they are great people I always look forward to seeing them at the shows.
I picked up some with the intention of trying them for walleye, maybe next year.
Rob don,t count them out just yet, bass love them, especially the green ones!
